Content.Text:
<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Salutations, <MYNAME>. Your arrival could not
have been more impeccably-timed!

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Look! Don't they simply take your breath away?

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
<WINDOW_ROSE_L>And they just happen to be in full bloom at this
very moment. Come, I simply must give you a
tour.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
<WINDOW_ROSE_L>In this season, the <ITEMNAME0> and
the <ITEMNAME1> are the loveliest.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
The seeds for these flowers here were sent to
me by my fiancee.
<PAGE>
She chooses only the finest flower seeds from
all over the world and sends them to me.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh! But you must remember, each flower has
different soil type preferences, so you must take
that into account before planting.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_ROSE_L>I make all my own fertilizer. I've spent many
years researching just the right composition to
bring out the richest hue in every petal.
<PAGE>
I won't touch chemical pesticides or anything of
the sort, of course. Unsightly solutions, those.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
<WINDOW_ROSE_L>My research is far from complete, but I think I've
done quite well so far. These beautiful blooms
are a testament to that.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What do you think, <MYNAME>? I'd love to hear
your opinion, one grower to another.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_ROSE_L>Ah, I'm so glad you understand the loveliness of
these flowers. Wonderful! I was right to show
them to you!
<PAGE>
Perhaps someday I will call on you and we can
view your garden.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<WINDOW_ROSE_L>Ah, I know! When your loveliest flower blooms,
bring it here, and we can admire its evanescent
beauty together.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_ROSE_L>I admit, I'm already looking forward to it.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
O-oh, they're simply "okay." All right.
<PAGE>
Well then, perhaps you should bring one of your
flowers here and show it to me, so I can see
how you grow them.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
My, aren't we confident? Well then, why don't
you bring one of your flowers to me, so I can
bask in its splendor myself?
